question: Do all players need a paid account?
answer: No! One Group Master subscription covers up to 6 players. Additional players can be added for $4.99 each per month.

question: Can I keep using my physical dice and minis?
answer: Absolutely! Nurl Play enhances your physical gameâ€”it doesn't replace it. Keep rolling those dice!

question: What games are supported?
answer: We support D&D 5E, Pathfinder, and more systems being added based on community demand.

question: Can I switch plans later?
answer: Yes! Upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime. We'll prorate any changes to your plan.
